## Installation

1. Download the `SimpleWeather-Windows-x64.zip` file from the assets below
2. Extract the archive
3. Run `SimpleWeather.Windows.exe`

## System Requirements

* Windows 10 version 1809 or higher
* .NET 6 Runtime (included in the package)
